price: 54. Hij zei: “Voorwaar jullie en jullie vaderen verkeerden in duidelijke dwaling."
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
